channel.title: How do I make myself on admin on a 508 Server
channel.description: Lol this is really embarrassing to ask but how do I make myself admin on my 508 server. I'm really new to this so if someone could please tell me I would be very thankful.

item.title: How do I make myself on admin on a 508 Server
item.dc:creator: @ar-temi-s ar-temi-s
item.description:
@ar-temi-s wrote:

login.java search for

                p.rights = 2;

and you should see somthing like

} if (p.username.equals("user")) { p.rights = 2; } if (p.username.equals("user")) { p.rights = 2; } if (p.username.equals("user")) { p.rights = 2; }

Read full topic
